content: NFT from MetaMask💁‍♂️ MetaMask in collaboration with Ledger launched quests for fulfillment of which you can get Free NFT.📝ACTIONS TO PARTICIPATE:• Go to the website connect to the wallet in the Polygon network;• Answers (may be mixed): Create separate accounts...; All answers are correct; Always use both together...; The device is safeguarded by a PIN...; The secure element prevents attackers...; All answers are correct; Hardware wallets are renowned...; Gigi should write it down...; MetaMask is a user-friendly interface...; MetaMask generates and protects private...; "Not your keys, not your coins"...; Public keys serve as your address...; On the blockchain, a distributed...
